titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on mixtures of 2-amino-2,3-dimethylbutanenitrile and toluene.
To extend the temporary suspension of duty on mixtures of 2-amino-2,3-dimethylbutanenitrile and toluene.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on mixtures of 2-amino-2,3-dimethylbutanenitrile and toluene.
